ISSUE.TITLE: use silo URL as first author URL, not web site(s) in profile
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ...to limit confusion and keep URLs-as-identifiers consistent over time. requested by @aaronpk since some people change the links in the profiles often and he wants to be able to identify them over time. [IRC discussion.](https://chat.indieweb.org/dev/2018-12-04#t1543947792918900) conclusion is to put both silo and profile URLs into `p-author`, but always put silo URL first. (also bridgy seems inconsistent? it might prefer profile links for replies/comments but silo URL for likes? need to investigate.)
